resources.string:
ButtonBox is an app for Sim Racers to control their gaming experience through the phone by simulating keyboard key presses. To edit the key bindings, hold down on any of the buttons.

Download the ButtonBox server from https://bit.ly/ButtonBoxServer and connect your phone to the same network.

Enjoy!
Download the ButtonBox server from https://bit.ly/ButtonBoxServer and connect your phone to the same network
